content: Hi - I'm relatively new to rust, and would like to get involved with the compiler development. I'd love to be pointed towards some starter issues (even if they are formatting or documentation) and hopefully get some mentoring. My real interests are in optimisation and type systems. In my day job I am a bioinformatician, coding in Python, Scala, Java, Haskell, and more recently, Rust.
Welcome! Are you subscribed to This Week in Rust?
There is usually a list of "help wanted" issues
I was talking with Niko earlier and I'm going to open a new stream for this purpose
well actually @davidtwco is going to open it for me because I don't have admin rights on Zulip :)
@Santiago Pastorino is it already done? I canâ€™t seem to find it.
@Yerkebulan Tulibergenov I don't think so, I couldn't reach out most of the people interested for that reason but tomorrow we will definitely create it :)
@Matthew Pocock @Kyle Strand @Yerkebulan Tulibergenov we've just created a stream for this purpose https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/212497-t-compiler.2Fhelp-wanted
